Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. After careful consideration and evaluation, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Our product offers unparalleled benefits and capabilities that could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and features, we are offering this opportunity to you at an exclusive price of $750000. We understand that the value of this product may resonate differently based on your specific requirements, but we are confident that it will provide substantial returns on your investment. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
